Curriculum Vitae 
PERSONAL INFORMATION 
• Full name :    
Trinh Anh Linh.

Male.

Vietnamese.

• Tel:      
(+84) 396829420.   
PROFILE 
• Personalities : Smart, humorous ,creative, cautious. 
• Administrator of group Vietnam Blockchain Developers. 
• Having knowledge and experiences in big data, high traffic systems and 
blockchain technology. 
EDUCATION

Ho Chi Minh City.

Software Engineering.

 7.23.

• IBM Blockchain Essentials

- Setup Hadoop, Hive and Scribe for storing the huge amounts of log 
data. 
- Create cronjobs to maintain systems.  
+ Nodejs : 2 years 
- Develop API services.
